title: Principle
text: The quadratic formula is in the form of $$\frac{\left(-b+\sqrt{b^2-4ac}\right)}{2} a$$ and $$\frac{\left(-b-\sqrt{b^2-4ac}\right)}{2} a$$. Determine the value of a, b, and c.

title: Using the Quadratic Formula
text: Plug the values into quadratic formula. A polynomial will typically be into the form of $$a x^2+b x+c=0$$.
